page.title: 14RECREATION:BMX,Rounders
page.content: BMX. BMX freestyle is a very popular sport at the moment. It is done on a special BMX bicycle which is stronger and lighter than a normal one. They are ridden round a difficult course where lots of tricks have to be performed. These tricks have names such as aerials, endos, kickturns, cowboys and wheelies. Some people ride BMX bicycles for a living and competitions are televised. BMX is also a racing sport but the racing bike is differnt from a freestyler as it does not have special attachments and has only a back brake. ROUNDERS. This is a very popular summer game played with great enthusiasm in this part of the country. Children play it at school and home but adults also take it vary seriously and there
